/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds and bathed in bright sunlight. Power lines crisscross above the street, creating a network of lines against the sky. Buildings line the street, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the scene. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and color of the city.
